price: (Saa nhyerεnee no sͻ) wͻ Afie (Masjid) a Nyankopͻn ama kwan sε yεmpagya, nni no nni, na yεmͻ no abodin nkaekae Ne din wͻ hͻ, na yεntontom no wͻ hͻ anͻpa ne anwummerε no mu.
arabic: فِي بُيُوتٍ أَذِنَ ٱللَّهُ أَن تُرۡفَعَ وَيُذۡكَرَ فِيهَا ٱسۡمُهُۥ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ فِيهَا بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fī buyūtin adhina al-lahu an tur'faʿa wayudh'kara fīhā us'muhu yusabbiḥu lahu fīhā bil-ghuduwi wal-āṣāli
